name: Gauge
content: Gauge was a human male stormtrooper of the First Order who served as a lieutenant. During the First Order-Resistance War, Lieutenant Gauge operated on Batuu, serving as the leader of stormtroopers there. Gauge's role was to run a First Order re-education facility, with the purpose of kidnapping and brainwashing innocent people to force them to fight for the First Order However, the facility never became fully operational, because Gauge made the mistake of kidnapping Seezelslak. As a result, an unnamed Droid technician came to rescue Seezelslak. In the process, he destroyed the facility, trying to use the drill to kill the technician but instead, he killed Gauge and all of the other Stormtroopers stationed there. Gauge was equipped with a red visor on his helmet, a communications relay on the right side of his helmet, and a double-sided red pauldron.
